漢羅台文: 就親像臺灣人毋願予中華民國和中華人民共和國奴才統治仝款。
台羅: Tō tshin-tshiūnn Tâi-uân-lâng m̄ guān hōo Tiong-huâ-bîn-kok hām Tiong-huâ-jîn-bîn-kiōng-hô-kok lôo-tsâi thóng-tī kāng-khuán.
台羅數字調: to7 tshin1-tshiunn7 tai5-uan5-lang5 m7 guan7 hoo7 tiong1-hua5-bin5-kok4 ham7 tiong1-hua5-jin5-bin5-kiong7-ho5-kok4 loo5-tsai5 thong2-ti7 kang7-khuan2.
白話字: Tō chhin-chhiūⁿ Tâi-oân-lâng m̄ goān hō͘ Tiong-hôa-bîn-kok hām Tiong-hôa-jîn-bîn-kiōng-hô-kok lô͘-châi thóng-tī kāng-khoán.
